sources.title: Cross Streets
sources.description: Johnny Mack Brown and Claire Windsor star in an old-fashioned but enjoyable tear-jerker. [The CINEPACK file is the source file, and it's the smallest video file.]

sources.title: Cross Streets (1934) JOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description:
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, Claire Windsor, Anita Louise 
Director: Frank R. Strayer

A man falls in love with a young woman, only to discover that she's the daughter of an ex-girlfriend who jilted him almost 20 years before! YIKES!

metadata.Plot: A man falls in love with a young woman, only to discover that she's the daughter of an ex-girlfriend who jilted him almost 20 years before.
metadata.Actors: Claire Windsor, Johnny Mack Brown, Anita Louise
